name: Out Of Memory (Hero's Code)
description:
**FULLSCREEN THE GAME.**

Or don't, your choice.

It's a match 3 game like candy crush or bejeweled. No audio because Unity literally said no. Credits in the description. The goal is the prevent your phone from bricking because Bapple only gives you like 8 gb of memory and it already took like 7 for "Settings". Anyways, hope you enjoy!

Bugs I already know and probably will never fix:

  • Sound, duh. Thank you Unity.
  • If you get a board that has no matches, you just have to restart the browser.
  • The slider is your timer, how much time you got left. It probably goes too quick.
  • The slider can be touched by players. Slide it to the top I dare you.
  • Once the slider reaches the top the game ends... Kinda. The process running the game will end. You will have to restart the browser to play again.

P.S. Never again will I use Unity.
